document.full_text: taliban insurgents abducted around 50 off-duty afghan policemen in an ambush in a volatile province in northeastern afghanistan, the militant group and provincial officials said on sunday.
document.title: taliban militants abduct 50 policemen in afghanistan
lines_and_colors: taliban insurgents abducted around 50 off-duty afghan policemen in an ambush in a volatile province in northeastern afghanistan, the militant group and provincial officials said on sunday.
